about_the_game:
Military God Mind Technique Gift Pack [Limited Benefits for Newcomers]
Including: Special effects book, sinking momentum
Learn the special skill "Sinking Power" after use, skill description: Attack causes 120 fixed damage.
Fixed damage is a very powerful attack type stunt that is commonly used in French physics. It disregards enemy defense and can cause fixed damage to the enemy in a single turn (except for Force Shield limitations),
The damage caused by combining AOE group attacks and double clicking skills is considerable.
Limited to 1 book, originally priced at 188 yuan, now discounted by 10% as a new exclusive welfare item.
Note: If you have purchased but have not claimed this DLC, please enter the "Start Game" interface of Steam Han Wu Emperor Zhuan. There is a "Manage My DLC" in the lower right corner of the interface. Remove all other checkmarks and only keep the hook for this DLC and the content addition package DLC to enter the game and claim it. After receiving it, check the other DLCs. Only one operation is required, and once successful, all archives will be permanently valid.
Customer service QQ: 392788593 Email: 392788593@qq.com
detailed_description:
Military God Mind Technique Gift Pack [Limited Benefits for Newcomers]
Including: Special effects book, sinking momentum
Learn the special skill "Sinking Power" after use, skill description: Attack causes 120 fixed damage.
Fixed damage is a very powerful attack type stunt that is commonly used in French physics. It disregards enemy defense and can cause fixed damage to the enemy in a single turn (except for Force Shield limitations),
The damage caused by combining AOE group attacks and double clicking skills is considerable.
Limited to 1 book, originally priced at 188 yuan, now discounted by 10% as a new exclusive welfare item.
Note: If you have purchased but have not claimed this DLC, please enter the "Start Game" interface of Steam Han Wu Emperor Zhuan. There is a "Manage My DLC" in the lower right corner of the interface. Remove all other checkmarks and only keep the hook for this DLC and the content addition package DLC to enter the game and claim it. After receiving it, check the other DLCs. Only one operation is required, and once successful, all archives will be permanently valid.
Customer service QQ: 392788593 Email: 392788593@qq.com
